thread.title: Police identify man fatally shot while driving on Delmar Boulevard
thread.title_full: Police identify man fatally shot while driving on Delmar Boulevard

author: From staff reports
title: Police identify man fatally shot while driving on Delmar Boulevard
text:
Police identify man fatally shot while driving on Delmar Boulevard From staff reports 9 hrs ago ( … ) 
ST. LOUIS • The man found shot to death Monday inside a wrecked car has been identified as Zeke Clark, 41, of St. Louis. 
Police say Clark was found dead inside a vehicle that hit a tree at about 6:30 p.m. Monday in the 4300 block of Delmar Boulevard. 
Investigators say Clark had been traveling west on Delmar when occupants of another vehicle fired shots into Clark's vehicle. 
Police have no suspects or motive in the case and did not have a description of the suspect's vehicle. 
Clark lived in the 5000 block of South Grand Boulevard.
